Inventory of the Williamsburg Area Performing Arts Center Records, 1999-2007 A Collection in the

archdesc.runner: Special Collections, Earl Gregg Swem Library, College of William and Mary

did.head: Overview of the Collection
did.unittitle: Williamsburg Area Performing Arts Center Records 1999-2007
did.abstract: Minutes, reports, correspondence and papers of the Williamsburg Area Performing Arts Center, formerly the Williamsburg Area Civic and Cultural Center, Inc. of Williamsburg, Virginia. This group attempted to create a performing arts center in the Williamsburg area, but was not successful.
did.origination: Williamsburg Area Civic and Cultural Center, Inc., 2000-2007 Anthony, James Williamsburg Area Performing Arts Center, "WAPAC", 2000-2007 arrangement

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Collection is open to all researchers.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Before publishing quotations or excerpts from any materials, permission must be obtained from the Special Collections Research Center, and the holder of the copyright, if not Swem Library.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Williamsburg Area Performing Arts Center Records, Special Collections Research Center, Swem Library, College of William and Mary

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The materials were acquired by Special Collections Research Center from James Anthony on 00/00/2008.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Described by Anne Johnson in December 2008.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: A corporation whose vision was to create a civic, cultural and performing arts center in the Williamsburg, Virginia. Further information about this individual or organization may be available in the Special Collections Research Center Wiki

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Minutes, reports, correspondence and papers of the Williamsburg Area Performing Arts Center, formerly the Williamsburg Area Civic and Cultural Center, Inc. of Williamsburg, Virginia. This group attempted to create a performing arts center in the Williamsburg area, but was not successful.

controlaccess.head: Index Terms
controlaccess.p: This Collection is indexed under the following controlled access subject terms.

controlaccess.head: Corporate Name:
controlaccess.corpname: Williamsburg Area Civic and Cultural Center, Inc. (Williamsburg, Va.)
